archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Update Customer Data
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Update the customer data in the customer inventory.

properties.value: The purpose of this process is to update the customer data in the customer inventory. This can happen as a result of direct notification from the customer, as a result of information gathered as part of other processes ( such as selling and order handling) or as a result of back office processes (such as customer data cleansing) .
